text: ya tumako isaka bhee itmenaan ho gaya ki phir tumako dobaara isee samandar mein le jaega usake baad hava ka ek aisa jhoka jo (jahaaz ke) parakhache uda de tum par bheje phir tumhen tumhaare kuphr kee saza mein duba maare phir tum kisee ko (aisa himaayatee) na paoge jo hamaara peechha kare aur (tumhen chhoda jae)
